17. Common relevant TCP/IP portsÂ¶

Port Default function
22 SSH
80 HTTP
443 HTTPS
1433 Microsoft SQL Server
3306 MySQL
5432 PostgreSQL
8443 Relatively common alternative for HTTPS (e.g. for testing)
